_header: Aethelwold the good clerk was I-bore in England
Subjects: saints’ lives; Aelthelwold, saint, life of
_description: Life of St Aethelwold, in the South English Legendary — in couplets

Bod779.First Lines:
Thelwold þe gode clerk was I bore in ingelondeIn his
                    ȝonge lyue he hated sinne & chonde…
Bod779.Last Lines:
…þer after anon his soule fro his body gan wendeIn to
                    þe blisse of heuene & god vs þedir sende
